website_summaries.verdict: Steer toward Nokia's Lumia 1320 for an affordable supersize phone you can rely on, but not before checking out Android rivals with fancier specs and comparable price tags.
pros: The wallet-friendly Nokia Lumia 1320 is an LTE-capable phone with solid build quality, good performance, and a healthy helping of Nokia's extra software perks
cons: You won't find your dream camera on the Lumia 1320, and storage space is limited

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, best OS
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone with what I think is the best phone OS. You can update it to the latest version by installing the app Preview For Developers (search for it in Bing as "preview for developers windows phone")
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer from Redmond, WA

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4G in the US (RM-994/996)
customer_reviews.text: I am upset only to the fact that they are advertising that it is 4G, yes it is, but not on US networks. On T-mobile it is only capable of 2G; The RM-994 is capable of 3G on at&t network only, T-mobiles 2G. The RM-996 is only 2G capable in the US. So please know this before you buy, Like I did..
customer_reviews.author: CMJONES

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, just not for T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. I love it. The size is wonderful. It runs smoothly, but it is not for the T-Mobile network. The highest speed I've seen is 2G. I really wish I would have paid more attention to that before I bought it, but other than that, it's really cool. Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this shipping was on time and the product was in tact
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: they love them, and because of their recommendations my nephew ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and sent to my relatives in Ghana, they love them, and because of their recommendations my nephew had ask me to order four more. These phones are the best.
customer_reviews.author: henry  darko

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective the microphone stop working after a month. There was so much static no one could stand to hear me. Got a new microphone and there was still too much static. I am very disappointed. The screen also started giving problem it kept jumping and not touching sometimes. Let see what else go wrong. Maybe this was an old phone or something not working well for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ardea Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, I always get comments saying it looks like a laptop as it is that big, but it's perfect for all your things but I still prefer an iphone for the Camara and the easy usage of it, the Camara is lot the best but it does take the pic and has a lot of effects you can do!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: best cell phone ever
customer_reviews.text: I really loved it. Size is perfect. And now, i Can take wonderfull pics. I'm thinking about buying one more for my mother. Best cell phone ever
customer_reviews.author: Deyse R.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter needed it badly so I let it go but was not too happy about that
customer_reviews.text: The phone got here in time jhowever it has a small crack on the lower side. My daughter needed it badly so I let it go but was not too happy about that, we are buying a cover to cover up the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Kleemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Their apps is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone except for one thing, NO GOOGLE APPS Microsoft apps is not working for me and they didn't have any. Not a huge selection of apps at all maybe like 100 altogether but other than that the phone was good nice big screen beautiful w8 layout I ended up selling it
customer_reviews.author: Prescious

customer_reviews.title: ... was my first windows phone and I couldn't be happier for change to this from iphone
customer_reviews.text: This was my first windows phone and I couldn't be happier for change to this from iphone. What I don't like is it does not have LTE, but my fault for buying international version I guess. Other than that is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This was a beginner phone andI like the size
customer_reviews.text: This was a beginner phone andI like the size. Insufficient apps and not very friendly with many micro sd cards. Not sure which card works the best. Hit and miss. Frustrating. 8g Ram is just too small if you have too many apps. WhiteRock BC
customer_reviews.author: 2ndchance superleaves

customer_reviews.title: Heart break
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this phone but broke my heart in two weeks as it became defective and was returned . Replaced by the new black Nokia..
customer_reviews.author: stephen frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!!... the screen is very goood, hace faster performance and the 3G signal is great here in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Carmona

customer_reviews.title: NOKIA LUMIA 1320
customer_reviews.text: This Phablet is great and does more than I expected. Camera shots are clear. I will definitely promote this Phablet.
customer_reviews.author: BILLYWHIZZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phablet ! Great one for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Resolution is very good. Fit nicely in the pocket. Quality of the device is Perfect. Windows Interface is amazing. Personally i like Windows Phone Interface. Lumia 1320 is Wonderful Phablet with good Performance.
customer_reviews.author: Prasanna

customer_reviews.title: A good phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone was brand new, (sealed) I like that. The phone it's large and the screen it's very nice, u can se in the sunlight with no problem.. The battery it's amazing lasts for at least 2 days(in my case).. Not LTE but totally worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Samuel C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: dobry telefon dla sympatyków oprogramowania Windows. Wszystko dzia'a jak nale'y.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: No 4G on T Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Not 4G on T mobile. Slow and randomly it resets.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Photos are fake.
customer_reviews.text: The phone in the photos is the 1520. Not the 1320. Obviously, it's to hoax you on the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: happy wife happy 😊 life
customer_reviews.text: I have the Nokia lumia 1520, great phone, I bought this Lumia 1320, and added a 64gb micro SD card, and it seems to be equal to the 1520, the best phablet and money saving, smart money... My wife loves it...
customer_reviews.author: THE WAY TRUE LIFE STYLE ELYTZ

customer_reviews.title: But cool price.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement picture is the wrong phone, you should check on that. But cool price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan sam

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 1320 Yellow 8GB Factory Unlocked GSM - International Version phone - No Warranty
product_meta.description: This Brand New Nokia 1320 Black 8GB Factory Unlocked GSM phone comes in Original Nokia box with all Original accessories in the box. This is GSM Version phone and will NOT work on CDMA Networks such as Sprint or Verizon.
